drug.name: Isoconazole
drug.description: Isoconazole is an azole antifungal drug that has similar effectiveness to clotrimazole in the treatment of foot and vaginal infections.

article.citation: Czaika VA, Siebenbrock J, Czekalla F, Zuberbier T, Sieber MA: Reactive oxygen species and the bacteriostatic and bactericidal effects of isoconazole nitrate. Mycoses. 2013 May;56 Suppl 1:16-22. doi: 10.1111/myc.12055.

Oyeka CA, Gugnani HC: Isoconazole nitrate versus clotrimazole in foot and nail infections due to Hendersonula toruloidea, Scytalidium hyalinum and dermatophytes. Mycoses. 1992 Nov-Dec;35(11-12):357-61.

Veraldi S: Isoconazole nitrate: a unique broad-spectrum antimicrobial azole effective in the treatment of dermatomycoses, both as monotherapy and in combination with corticosteroids. Mycoses. 2013 May;56 Suppl 1:3-15. doi: 10.1111/myc.12054.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzylethers. These are aromatic ethers with the general formula ROCR' (R = alkyl, aryl; R'=benzene).

category.category: Genito Urinary System and Sex Hormones

atc-code.level: ANTIINFECTIVES AND ANTISEPTICS, EXCL. COMBINATIONS WITH CORTICOSTEROIDS
GENITO URINARY SYSTEM AND SEX HORMONES
ANTIINFECTIVES AND ANTISEPTICS, EXCL. COMBINATIONS WITH CORTICOSTEROIDS
GENITO URINARY SYSTEM AND SEX HORMONES

drug-interaction.name: Amphotericin B
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Amphotericin B can be decreased when used in combination with Isoconazole.

drug-interaction.name: Didanosine
drug-interaction.description: Didanosine can cause a decrease in the absorption of Isoconazole resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Sildenafil
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Sildenafil can be increased when it is combined with Isoconazole.

drug-interaction.name: Sucralfate
drug-interaction.description: Sucralfate can cause a decrease in the absorption of Isoconazole resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Atorvastatin
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of myopathy can be increased when Isoconazole is combined with Atorvastatin.

drug-interaction.name: Isradipine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Isoconazole can be increased when used in combination with Isradipine.
